Class BanHandler

java.lang.Object
  BanHandler

public class BanHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Title: BanHandler

Description: A Handler for checking if a player is banned or banning a player

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 newbiehacker

Company: Project HybridScape
